description:
A recent survey, run by behavioral psychology grad students' blog Date Psychology, reported that 28.5% of women found the Magic: The Gathering hobby attractive in a man - compared to only 7% of male respondents who thought women would find it attractive.

Continue reading MTG is 3 times more attractive to women than men think, survey finds
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How to play Warhammer 40k ,
title: MTG is 3 times more attractive to women than men think, survey finds

description:
By the grace of the Emperor, after 13 years of faithful waiting, Warhammer 40k Space Marine 2 is finally here - and I can kick off our Space Marine 2 review by reassuring you on at least one point: it feels fantastic. From the first bolt pistol shot and chainsword downswing, to the last wrenching-off of a Tyranid’s chitinous head, this long awaited sequel gets full marks for its most crucial assignment: making you feel like an eight-foot-tall power-armored death machine.

Continue reading Warhammer 40k Space Marine 2 review - a fantas
title: Warhammer 40k Space Marine 2 review - a fantastic, frustrating hybrid

description:
Bewilderingly, sushi and tacos have become the focus of a heated Dungeons and Dragons discussion online, as art from the new D&D Player’s Handbook happens to feature both of these foods. After a fan Tweet from September 1 decried this artistic choice as “nonsense”, several members of the D&D community rushed to defend sushi and tacos’ status as fantasy game food.

Continue reading DnD fans debate whether sushi is unrealistic in a make-believe game
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024
title: DnD fans debate whether sushi is unrealistic in a make-believe game

description:
Wizards of the Coast revealed Meathook Massacre II, a sequel to another infamous Magic: The Gathering card, on September 3. And, like almost every sequel to an iconic horror movie, this new MTG card is a worse, more expensive imitation of its predecessor. Wizards is nailing the schlock-y horror vibes of Duskmourn, it seems.

Continue reading Like most sequels, MTG’s Meathook Massacre II is much worse
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in
title: Like most sequels, MTG’s Meathook Massacre II is much worse

description:
Paul ‘Fat Bloke’ Sawyer, co-founder of pre-eminent historical wargames publisher Warlord Games and celebrated White Dwarf magazine editor of the 1990s, has shared with the public that he’s been diagnosed with stage four brain cancer, and has “around 12 months left to live”.

Continue reading Legendary White Dwarf editor Paul Sawyer has terminal brain cancer
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best WW2 games,
title: Legendary White Dwarf editor Paul Sawyer has terminal brain cancer

description:
Upcoming Magic: The Gathering set Duskmourn is full of nods to the horror genre, and we’re a real big fan of this latest one. The Green sorcery card Say It’s Name is a reference to monsters that are summoned when you repeatedly say their name, like Bloody Mary, Candyman, and Beetlejuice.

Continue reading MTG Duskmourn’s latest horror reference is a Beetlejuice Beetle
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order,
title: MTG Duskmourn’s latest horror reference is a Beetlejuice Beetle

description:
Dungeons and Dragons publisher Wizards of the Coast has already made rules errata for its new Player’s Handbook. Digital copies of the 2024 Player’s Handbook went live on D&D Beyond on September 3, with Master Tier subscribers able to access the book ahead of its worldwide release date. This version of the rulebook features several tweaks that aren’t present in physical copies.

Continue reading DnD has already corrected some of its most overpowered new rules
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's
title: DnD has already corrected some of its most overpowered new rules

description:
The lizard outlaw MTG card Laughing Jasper Flint is shifting upwards in value. If you’re lucky enough to own a copy of the extended frame version of this card, we’re happy to inform you that it’s spiked by a whopping 425%, jumping from $3.60 last week to $18.90 today. Regular copies are much cheaper, but they, like all variants, are also on the rise. Having been priced at 50 cents since Thunder Junction, they’re now going for around $4.60 a copy.

Continue reading Legendary lizard MTG card spikes in price by 425%
MORE FROM WARGA
title: Legendary lizard MTG card spikes in price by 425%

description:
Wizards of the Coast has released a new set of basic rules for Dungeons and Dragons, based on the updates made in the 2024 Player’s Handbook. Like the 2014 Basic Rules, these are freely available on the D&D Beyond website. The 2024 Free Rules went live on September 3 – the same day that the full Player’s Handbook was made available to D&D Beyond’s Master Tier subscribers.

Continue reading You can grab DnD’s new 2024 basic rules for free - here’s how
MORE FROM WARGAMER:
title: You can grab DnD’s new 2024 basic rules for free - here’s how
